mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Wish is Our Command!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, let me tell you about the time I demanded a personal chef at a friend's barbecue. I stroll in, taking in the aroma of grilled delights, when it hits me: there's no personal chef. Outrageous! I stand there, feeling my entitlement levels skyrocket, and declare, "I simply cannot be expected to enjoy this gathering without the culinary prowess of a dedicated chef at my disposal!" Needless to say, my friend was mortified, but I reveled in my bold declaration. And wouldn't you know it, within the hour, a chef magically appeared, ready to cater to my every whim. And that, my friends, is how you turn a backyard BBQ into a five-star dining experience.
